item.title: nginx编译报错
item.description: 在ubuntu(32bit)上安装nginx执行configure时遇到错误如下： 1 2 3 4 ./configure: error: the HTTP rewrite module requires the PCRE library. You can either disable the module by using --without-http_rewrite_module option, or install the PCRE library
